Licensing[edit]

Public domainPublic domainfalsefalse
This Namibian work is now in the public domain because its copyright protection has expired in Namibia by virtue of the Copyright and Neighbouring Rights Protection Act 6 of 1994, § 6, Sec. 1 (details). The work meets one of the following criteria:

a) it is a cinematograph film, photograph or computer program and 50 years have passed since the end of the year in which it was first made available to the public with the consent of the copyright holder;
b) it is another type of work and 50 years have passed since the end of the calendar year in which the author died.


To the uploader: Please provide the authorship and publication details.

English | +/−


This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

File history

Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

Date/TimeThumbnailDimensionsUserComment
current22:23, 28 November 2021900 × 600 (788 bytes)MapGrid (talk | contribs)Adding one significant digit to star coordinates. This is only for the sake of being consistent with File:Flag of Namibia (vertical).svg.
22:59, 20 September 2019900 × 600 (793 bytes)MapGrid (talk | contribs)Kept the clip path but restored the old viewBox. Restored newline characters to make the source more readable. Restored the old comment showing the calculation for the star's y coordinate. Painted outside of sun as a single path. Reverted other so called "optimizations and fixes" added in the previous image because they were causing unnecessary file bloat.
17:33, 19 September 2019900 × 600 (1 KB)FDRMRZUSA (talk | contribs)Simplified svg internal structure (truncated "white-edged red diagonal band" in excess of flag border by "clip" function of "Inkscape": better flag management). Same file and same image. Optimized and fixed svg code before upload. No other changes.
23:32, 7 February 2015900 × 600 (853 bytes)SiBr4 (talk | contribs)Correcting vertical placement of sun per geometric specifications in constitution; cloning sunrays
14:15, 22 December 2013900 × 600 (798 bytes)Bast64~commonswiki (talk | contribs)Better code
16:21, 4 December 2012900 × 600 (805 bytes)SiBr4 (talk | contribs)Smaller code
00:45, 13 June 2006900 × 600 (2 KB)Madden (talk | contribs)clipping
22:59, 12 June 2006900 × 600 (2 KB)Madden (talk | contribs)simpler code
14:33, 16 February 2006900 × 600 (2 KB)Vzb83~commonswiki (talk | contribs)redrawn using construction sheet at http://www.vexilla-mundi.com/namibia.htm
06:25, 17 September 2005453 × 302 (3 KB)Gmaxwell (talk | contribs)The national flag of Namibia in SVG by Gregory Maxwell. Copyright 2005. {{GFDL-1.2}} Category:SVG category:flags
